title: Amanda and Justin split up
text:
Movie stars Amanda Seyfried and Justin Long have called time on their romantic relationship. 
According to People , the couple have "decided" split up after dating for approximately two years. 
A source has revealed to the publication that the split actually occurred 2 months back and that the couple "never lived together". 
The reasoning behind their split according to People’s source is due to the fact that both parties were incompatible for one another. 
Because of this, the couple then made the decision to end their romance, the source revealed. 
The source told people that the couple "both tried very hard to make it work", but of course things didn’t work out due to their "compatible" issues. 
The couple even wanted to start a family, says the source. 
However, the source adds that both parties "are still on good terms". 
According to People , the couple began dating in 2013. Staff Reporter
